emuInput.TitMainTitle: Nurses leading boxer Joe Louis and other men through corridor in Butler Veterans' Hospital
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper September 25, 1943, pg. unknown, reads: "Joe Johns and His Boxing Troupe Visit Bedridden Soldiers at Veterans Hospital - On his way to Camp Shenango last Monday, Sgt. Joe Louis and his touring troupe of boxers stopped off at the Veteran's hospital in Butler to visit some of the inmates.  Top, left to right: Two happy nurses lead the champion through the hospital halls to the wards...  Harris Photos."
